CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SSA', Apttus__Other_Party_Signed_By__r.Email ,IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Care_Agreement', Apttus__Company_Signed_By__r.Email , IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'NDA',Apttus__Other_Party_Signed_By__r.Email , NULL) ))
CustomField.label: Recipient 3
